means: <日>（挂在壁上的）字轴，画轴，长轴

sentence.Network_en: Debbie purchased several kakemono scrolls during her year as an exchange student in Japan.
sentence.Network_cn: 德比在日本做交换学生时买了几卷画轴.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 什么英语单词中有两个k_百度知道 ... kaka 一种非洲的鹦鹉 kakemono 字画 kakistocracy 恶人政治.
图文(瓶挂)、Furo(风炉)、Ro(炉)、Kakemono(挂物)、Karamono(唐物)、Kuniyakimono(国焼物)、Sensu(扇子、Futaoki(盖置)、Gotoku(五徳)、Kaishi(怀纸)、Kensui.
kakeji 挂二, kakemono 条幅, kakeji 挂治

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: Japanese, from kake- 'hang, suspend' + mono 'thing'

means.word_mean: 1. a Japanese (paper or silk) wall hanging; usually narrow with a picture or writing on it and a roller at the bottom
